title: ContextSuite Semantic Event Analysis
description: Schema for internal cost or processing analysis related to an event. Not for general client use.

item.description: The item analyzed (e.g., a specific AI model or service).

provider.description: The provider of the analyzed item.

variant.description: The variant of the item used (e.g., model size).

processing_time.description: Time taken for processing in seconds.

amount.description: Cost associated with this analysis item.
